amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part A of House Report 119-399 to increase the available supply of mitigation bank credits, driving down the cost curve and lowering home prices both through directly lowering the regulatory cost of building a new home and allowing builders to use lots that the cost of mitigation today prevents them from using.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crawford amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Crawford amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
